Class SynchronizationManager

java.lang.Object
  br.furb.inf.tcc.tankcoders.client.SynchronizationManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.captiveimagination.jgn.clientserver.JGNConnectionListener, com.captiveimagination.jgn.event.MessageListener, com.captiveimagination.jgn.Updatable
public class SynchronizationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.captiveimagination.jgn.Updatable, com.captiveimagination.jgn.event.MessageListener, com.captiveimagination.jgn.clientserver.JGNConnectionListener

Custom implementation of JGN SynchronizationManager of the author Matthew D. Hicks. This implementation improve the objects synchronization.

Author:
Germano Fronza
